jcolibri.cbrcore
Class CBRContextChecker

java.lang.Object
  jcolibri.cbrcore.CBRContextChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CBRContextChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Instance of this class will track the changed on the context because of a CBR application configuration. Also will check that new methods are compatible with context situation at every moment.

Author:
Juan José Bello
See Also:
